allow-monitor.help: Enable/disable allowing the central management server to remotely monitor this FortiGate
allow-monitor.name: allow-monitor

allow-push-configuration.help: Enable/disable allowing the central management server to push configuration changes to this FortiGate.
allow-push-configuration.name: allow-push-configuration

allow-push-firmware.help: Enable/disable allowing the central management server to push firmware updates to this FortiGate.
allow-push-firmware.name: allow-push-firmware

allow-remote-firmware-upgrade.help: Enable/disable remotely upgrading the firmware on this FortiGate from the central management server.
allow-remote-firmware-upgrade.name: allow-remote-firmware-upgrade

ca-cert.help: CA certificate to be used by FGFM protocol.
ca-cert.name: ca-cert

enc-algorithm.help: Encryption strength for communications between the FortiGate and central management.
enc-algorithm.name: enc-algorithm

options.help: High strength algorithms and these medium-strength 128-bit key length algorithms: RC4-SHA, RC4-MD5, RC4-MD.
options.name: default

options.help: 128-bit and larger key length algorithms: DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA, AES256-SHA, EDH-RSA-DES-CBC3-SHA, DES-CBC3-SHA, DES-CBC3-MD5, DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA, AES128-SHA.
options.name: high

options.help: 64-bit or 56-bit key length algorithms without export restrictions: EDH-RSA-DES-CDBC-SHA, DES-CBC-SHA, DES-CBC-MD5.
options.name: low

fmg.help: IP address or FQDN of the FortiManager.
fmg.name: fmg

fmg-source-ip.help: IPv4 source address that this FortiGate uses when communicating with FortiManager.
fmg-source-ip.name: fmg-source-ip

fmg-source-ip6.help: IPv6 source address that this FortiGate uses when communicating with FortiManager.
fmg-source-ip6.name: fmg-source-ip6

fmg-update-port.help: Port used to communicate with FortiManager that is acting as a FortiGuard update server.
fmg-update-port.name: fmg-update-port

options.help: Use port 8890 to communicate with FortiManager that is acting as a FortiGuard update server.
Use port 443 to communicate with FortiManager that is acting as a FortiGuard update server.

include-default-servers.help: Enable/disable inclusion of public FortiGuard servers in the override server list.
include-default-servers.name: include-default-servers

options.help: Enable inclusion of public FortiGuard servers in the override server list.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable inclusion of public FortiGuard servers in the override server list.
options.name: disable

interface.help: Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface.name: interface

interface-select-method.help: Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-method.name: interface-select-method

options.help: Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
options.name: sdwan

local-cert.help: Certificate to be used by FGFM protocol.
local-cert.name: local-cert

options.help: Manage and configure this FortiGate from FortiManager.
options.name: normal

options.help: Manage and configure this FortiGate locally and back up its configuration to FortiManager.
options.name: backup

schedule-config-restore.help: Enable/disable allowing the central management server to restore the configuration of this FortiGate.
schedule-config-restore.name: schedule-config-restore

schedule-script-restore.help: Enable/disable allowing the central management server to restore the scripts stored on this FortiGate.
schedule-script-restore.name: schedule-script-restore

addr-type.help: Indicate whether the FortiGate communicates with the override server using an IPv4 address, an IPv6 address or a FQDN.
addr-type.name: addr-type

options.help: AV, IPS, and AV-query update server.
options.name: update

options.help: Web filter and anti-spam rating server.
options.name: rating

server-list.help: Additional severs that the FortiGate can use for updates (for AV, IPS, updates) and ratings (for web filter and antispam ratings) servers.
server-list.name: server-list

options.help: Central management of this FortiGate using FortiCloud.
options.name: fortiguard

vdom.help: Virtual domain (VDOM) name to use when communicating with FortiManager.
vdom.name: vdom
